20110125023111.000|20110125023113.000|CC1|AUTOMOBILE, AND IT ALSO GAVE US 
20110125023113.000|20110125023118.000|CC1|MOTOWN.                         
20110125023118.000|20110125023120.000|CC1|ONE MILLION PEOPLE LIVE HERE OF 
20110125023120.000|20110125023129.000|CC1|WHICH 80% ARE AFRO-AMERICAN.    
20110125023129.000|20110125023131.000|CC1|MOTOWN RECORDS HAS RELOCATED TO 
20110125023131.000|20110125023132.000|CC1|LOS ANGELES, AND ALL THAT       
20110125023132.000|20110125023134.000|CC1|REMAINS HERE IS A MUSEUM.       
20110125023134.000|20110125023135.000|CC1|HOWEVER, THAT DOESN'T MEAN THAT 
20110125023135.000|20110125023137.000|CC1|MUSIC HAS LEFT DETROIT.         
20110125023137.000|20110125023138.000|CC1|HIP-HOP WAS INVENTED IN THE     
20110125023138.000|20110125023140.000|CC1|SEVENTIES.                      
20110125023140.000|20110125023142.000|CC1|IT'S A FUSION OF WEST-AFRICAN   
20110125023142.000|20110125023144.000|CC1|POETRY, LATINO AND CARIBBEAN    
20110125023144.000|20110125023146.000|CC1|RHYTHM AND SOUND, AND THE APPEAL
20110125023146.000|20110125023154.000|CC1|OF HIP-HOP IS UNIVERSAL.        
20110125023154.000|20110125023156.000|CC1|HIP-HOP ISN'T JUST MUSIC; IT'S  
20110125023156.000|20110125023159.000|CC1|BREAK-DANCING, GRAFFITI, POETRY.
20110125023159.000|20110125023200.000|CC1|>> THEY DRAG THE RED FROM ROOM  
20110125023200.000|20110125023202.000|CC1|TO ROOM IN A LINE 2-FEET HIGH   
20110125023202.000|20110125023204.000|CC1|THEN SCRUNCH DOWN AND CRAWL THE

20110125023556.000|20110125023558.000|CC1|THE HENRY FORD MUSEUM OFFERS AN 
20110125023558.000|20110125023600.000|CC1|IMPRESSING HOMAGE TO THE MOTOR  
20110125023600.000|20110125023601.000|CC1|CAR AND IT'S IMPACT ON THE      
20110125023601.000|20110125023603.000|CC1|UNITED STATES OF AMERICA.       
20110125023603.000|20110125023605.000|CC1|THE MUSEUM BEGAN AS FAR BACK AS 
20110125023605.000|20110125023607.000|CC1|1906 AS HENRY FORD'S PERSONAL   
20110125023607.000|20110125023610.000|CC1|COLLECTION OF HISTORIC OBJECTS. 
20110125023610.000|20110125023611.000|CC1|IT'S THE LARGEST INDOOR/OUTDOOR 
20110125023611.000|20110125023613.000|CC1|MUSEUM IN THE UNITED STATES OF  
20110125023613.000|20110125023615.000|CC1|AMERICA.                        
20110125023615.000|20110125023617.000|CC1|NOVEMBER 22, 1963, PRESIDENT    
20110125023617.000|20110125023619.000|CC1|JOHN F. KENNEDY WAS             
20110125023619.000|20110125023620.000|CC1|ASSASSINATED WHILE RIDING       
20110125023620.000|20110125023621.000|CC1|IN THAT CAR.                    
20110125023621.000|20110125023623.000|CC1|AT THE TIME, IT WAS BLUE AND IT 
20110125023623.000|20110125023624.000|CC1|WAS A CONVERTIBLE, BUT THEN THEY
20110125023624.000|20110125023626.000|CC1|DECIDED TO PAINT IT BLACK AND   
20110125023626.000|20110125023627.000|CC1|ARMOR-PLATE IT FIGURING IT WOULD
20110125023627.000|20110125023628.000|CC1|BE CHEAPER THAN BUYING A NEW    
20110125023628.000|20110125023629.000|CC1|ONE.                            
20110125023629.000|20110125023631.000|CC1|SINCE THEN, THAT CAR HAS BEEN   
20110125023631.000|20110125023632.000|CC1|USED BY PRESIDENTS JOHNSON,     
20110125023632.000|20110125023639.000|CC1|NIXON, CARTER, AND FORD.        
20110125023639.000|20110125023641.000|CC1|THIS IS THE MODEL T, AND IT WAS 
20110125023641.000|20110125023643.000|CC1|THIS CAR THAT MADE HENRY FORD   
20110125023643.000|20110125023645.000|CC1|THE RICHEST MAN IN THE WORLD.   
20110125023645.000|20110125023647.000|CC1|IT WAS HIS IDEA TO DESIGN A CAR 
20110125023647.000|20110125023648.000|CC1|THAT ANYBODY COULD AFFORD--     
20110125023648.000|20110125023650.000|CC1|AN EVERYMAN CAR.                
20110125023650.000|20110125023651.000|CC1|AND HE CALCULATED BY PAYING HIS 
20110125023651.000|20110125023653.000|CC1|OWN WORKERS A LITTLE MORE MONEY,
20110125023653.000|20110125023654.000|CC1|THEY WOULD THEN BE ABLE TO      
20110125023654.000|20110125023656.000|CC1|AFFORD THE VERY CARS THAT THEY  
20110125023656.000|20110125023658.000|CC1|WERE MANUFACTURING.             
20110125023658.000|20110125023702.000|CC1|FROM 1908-1927, 17 MILLION      
20110125023702.000|20110125023704.000|CC1|MODEL T'S WERE PRODUCED.        
20110125023704.000|20110125023705.000|CC1|AND HENRY FORD COULD DO THAT    
20110125023705.000|20110125023706.000|CC1|BECAUSE HE PERFECTED THE        
20110125023706.000|20110125023707.000|CC1|AUTOMATED ASSEMBLY LINE,        
20110125023707.000|20110125023709.000|CC1|HE INVENTED THE IDEA OF         
20110125023709.000|20110125023710.000|CC1|INTERCHANGEABLE CAR PARTS, AND  
20110125023710.000|20110125023712.000|CC1|HE BECAME KNOWN AS THE FATHER OF
20110125023712.000|20110125023714.000|CC1|MASS PRODUCTION.

20110125023720.000|20110125023721.000|CC1|>> YEAH.                        
20110125023721.000|20110125023722.000|CC1|OH, MY GOSH!

20110125023727.000|20110125023728.000|CC1|>> YEP, OK.                     
20110125023728.000|20110125023730.000|CC1|>> HOW DO YOU DO THAT?          
20110125023730.000|20110125023731.000|CC1|>> WELL, FIRST THING WE GOTTA DO
20110125023731.000|20110125023732.000|CC1|IS WE GOTTA GET OUT OF THE      
20110125023732.000|20110125023734.000|CC1|VEHICLE, BUT WE WANT TO ENGAGE  
20110125023734.000|20110125023735.000|CC1|THE EMERGENCY LEVER.            
20110125023735.000|20110125023736.000|CC1|WE DON'T WANT THAT ROLLING

20110125023831.000|20110125023833.000|CC1|>> HENRY FORD WAS BORN IN 1863.

20110125023843.000|20110125023845.000|CC1|THE HENRY FORD MUSEUM IS A      
20110125023845.000|20110125023847.000|CC1|12-ACRE SITE, AND THE GROUNDS   
20110125023847.000|20110125023849.000|CC1|OUTSIDE ARE BETTER DESCRIBED AS 
20110125023849.000|20110125023851.000|CC1|A VILLAGE.

20110125023854.000|20110125023857.000|CC1|ORIGINALS, AND SOME WERE BROUGHT
20110125023857.000|20110125023859.000|CC1|HERE BRICK BY BRICK, LIKE THIS  
20110125023859.000|20110125023902.000|CC1|COTSWOLD COTTAGE.               
20110125023902.000|20110125023903.000|CC1|HE BECAME AN ENGINEER WITH THE  
20110125023903.000|20110125023905.000|CC1|THOMAS EDISON ILLUMINATING      
20110125023905.000|20110125023907.000|CC1|COMPANY IN 1891, AND WORKING    
20110125023907.000|20110125023909.000|CC1|WITH EDISON, FORD DEVELOPED HIS 
20110125023909.000|20110125023911.000|CC1|OWN SELF-PROPELLING VEHICLE, THE
20110125023911.000|20110125023913.000|CC1|QUADRICYCLE.

20110125023915.000|20110125023916.000|CC1|LABORATORY WHERE HE PERFECTED   
20110125023916.000|20110125023918.000|CC1|THE INCANDESCENT LIGHT BULB,    
20110125023918.000|20110125023919.000|CC1|INVENTED THE PHONOGRAPH.        
20110125023919.000|20110125023921.000|CC1|HE HAS OVER 1,093 PATENTS TO HIS

20110125023933.000|20110125023935.000|CC1|OF THE STATES ON THE SHORES OF

20110125023939.000|20110125023941.000|CC1|LARGEST LAKE, BY SURFACE VOLUME 
20110125023941.000|20110125023943.000|CC1|THAT IS, CONTAINING 10% OF THE  
20110125023943.000|20110125023945.000|CC1|WORLD'S FRESH WATER.

20110125024651.000|20110125024652.000|CC1|>> THIS WAS A TIMBER WOLF, OR   
20110125024652.000|20110125024653.000|CC1|THE LARGEST OF THE CANINES THAT 
20110125024653.000|20110125024655.000|CC1|ARE IN NORTH AMERICA.           
20110125024655.000|20110125024656.000|CC1|ITS LITTLE COUSIN HERE IS THE   
20110125024656.000|20110125024658.000|CC1|COYOTE.                         
20110125024658.000|20110125024659.000|CC1|AND YOU CAN SEE THAT GENETICALLY
20110125024659.000|20110125024701.000|CC1|THESE 2 ARE VERY SIMILAR.       
20110125024701.000|20110125024702.000|CC1|A LOT OF COMMON DNA BETWEEN THE 
20110125024702.000|20110125024704.000|CC1|2.                              
20110125024704.000|20110125024706.000|CC1|LYNX, ONE OF THE FELINES, ALONG 
20110125024706.000|20110125024708.000|CC1|WITH THE BOBCAT.                
20110125024708.000|20110125024710.000|CC1|AND MOST PEOPLE CONFUSE THE 2,  
20110125024710.000|20110125024711.000|CC1|ALTHOUGH YOU CAN SEE THE BOBCAT 
20110125024711.000|20110125024714.000|CC1|GOT A LOT OF SPOTS ON IT.       
20110125024714.000|20110125024715.000|CC1|AND THE LYNX IS VERY SOFT.      
20110125024715.000|20110125024717.000|CC1|AND IF YOU FEEL THE UNDERSIDE,  
20110125024717.000|20110125024718.000|CC1|IT'S JUST AS SOFT AS A KITTEN   
20110125024718.000|20110125024721.000|CC1|THERE ON THE UNDERSIDE.         
20110125024721.000|20110125024722.000|CC1|THIS IS THE BEAVER.             
20110125024722.000|20110125024723.000|CC1|>> BEAVER.

20110125025433.000|20110125025435.000|CC1|TO BUILD THE GREAT PYRAMID.

20110125025449.000|20110125025450.000|CC1|>> IT WAS PRESUMABLY ROBBED OUT
